Hey everyone,
Glad to see so much work in Slack.Â :slightly_smiling_face:
Just want to share a Python script I did for verify a contact lists email and see if they are valid or not.
If you want to improve it please feel free to fork it..
<https://github.com/CristieNordic/HubSpot_verify_contact>

I hope someone do something good with this for the future.
Because by verify all your contacts on regular basis should be good and also support for Secure SMTP.
We had a testing API in our portfolio for many years cause this is an important and mostly overlooked topic.
Hey <@U012M1K3PKM> it appears your link above is going to a 404. Would you be able to update the link?
Yes, I know. we found a security issue. It will be back tomorrow
